post.text: Hillary's been fighting for kids and families her entire career—and that's the experience she'll take to the White House.

comment.author: Savannah
comment.text: Hillary you said that your dream is open borders, you said it. But what difference does it make to your supporters who can car less about our security.

replies.author: Joseph Dean
replies.text: Kaitlin this one wouldn't open, I'll try later
